author: Edward de Bono
message: It is better to have enough ideas for some of them to be wrong, than to be always right by having no ideas at all.
title: Thought of the day

author: Abraham Lincoln
message: Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lao Tzu
message: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.
title: Thought of the day

author: Amy Tan
message: I am like a falling star who has finally found her place next to another in a lovely constellation, where we will sparkle in the heavens forever.
title: Thought of the day
